description.zh-cn: 广东梅县人，中国舰船设计工程师。曾担任国家航母工程副总设计师、中国舰船研究设计中心所长，现任中国船舶集团有限公司副总经理。
description.en: A native of Meixian, Guangdong, and a Chinese ship design engineer. He has served as the deputy chief designer of the national aircraft carrier project, the director of the China Ship Research & Design Center, and is currently the deputy general manager of China State Shipbuilding Corporation Limited.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员列表

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员列表
中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员
第十九届中央委员会候补委员

description.zh-cn: 代表中国共产党第十九届中央委员会的候补委员群体。
description.en: Represents the group of alternate members of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国武汉市的高等院校，是华中科技大学的前身之一。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Wuhan, China, and one of the predecessors of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.

nodes.id: 中国舰船研究设计中心

zh-cn: 中国舰船研究设计中心

description.zh-cn: 又称701研究所或武汉船舶设计研究所，主要从事舰船研究设计。
description.en: Also known as the 701 Research Institute or Wuhan Ship Design Institute, primarily engaged in ship research and design.

description.zh-cn: 中国舰船设计工程师，吴晓光的前任，曾任中国舰船研究设计中心所长。
description.en: A Chinese ship design engineer and the predecessor of Wu Xiaoguang, who served as the director of the China Ship Research & Design Center.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国旨在设计和建造国产航空母舰的国家级重大工程项目。
description.en: A major national engineering project of the People's Republic of China aimed at designing and building domestically produced aircraft carriers.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军的第一艘航空母舰。
description.en: The first aircraft carrier of the People's Liberation Army Navy.

en: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国武汉市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, China.

zh-cn: 中国船舶重工集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 曾为中国特大型国有企业，于2019年与中国船舶工业集团有限公司合并组建中国船舶集团。
description.en: Formerly a large state-owned enterprise in China, it merged with China State Shipbuilding Industry Corporation in 2019 to form China State Shipbuilding Corporation.

zh-cn: 中国船舶集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由中国船舶工业集团有限公司与中国船舶重工集团有限公司于2019年合并而成的特大型国有重要骨干企业。
description.en: A super-large state-owned key enterprise formed by the merger of China State Shipbuilding Industry Corporation and China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation in 2019.

nodes.id: 中国船舶工业集团有限公司

zh-cn: 中国船舶工业集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 曾为中国特大型国有企业，于2019年与中国船舶重工集团有限公司合并组建中国船舶集团。
description.en: Formerly a large state-owned enterprise in China, it merged with China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation in 2019 to form China State Shipbuilding Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 吴晓光的继任者，担任中国舰船研究设计中心（701研究所）所长。
description.en: The successor to Wu Xiaoguang as the director of the China Ship Research & Design Center (701 Research Institute).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省梅州市下的市辖区，是吴晓光的籍贯地。
description.en: A municipal district of Meizhou, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, and the ancestral home of Wu Xiaoguang.

description.zh-cn: 吴晓光是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wu Xiaoguang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员列表

description.zh-cn: 2017年10月，吴晓光在中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会上当选中国共产党第十九届中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: In October 2017, Wu Xiaoguang was elected as an alternate member of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China at the 19th National Congress of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1982年本科毕业于华中工学院船舶设计与制造专业。
description.en: Graduated with a bachelor's degree in Ship Design and Manufacturing from Huazhong Institute of Technology in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 2008年在职获得华中科技大学船舶与海洋结构物设计及制造专业博士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Ph.D. in Ship and Marine Structure Design and Manufacturing from Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2008 while in service.

relationships.target: 中国舰船研究设计中心

description.zh-cn: 自1982年起在该研究所工作，历任助理工程师、工程师、总体科副科长、副主任、主任、副所长等职，并于2004年3月至2018年9月担任所长。
description.en: He worked at the institute since 1982, serving in various roles including assistant engineer, engineer, deputy section chief, deputy director, director, and deputy director, and served as the director from March 2004 to September 2018.

position.en: Deputy General Manager, Member of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 2018年9月，吴晓光任中国船舶重工集团有限公司副总经理、党组成员，直至2019年10月公司合并。
description.en: In September 2018, Wu Xiaoguang was appointed as Deputy General Manager and a member of the Party Leadership Group of China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation, until the company's merger in October 2019.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月中国船舶工业集团与中国船舶重工集团合并后，吴晓光继续担任新成立的中国船舶集团有限公司副总经理职务。
description.en: After the merger of China State Shipbuilding Industry Corporation and China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation in October 2019, Wu Xiaoguang continued to serve as the Deputy General Manager of the newly formed China State Shipbuilding Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 吴晓光担任国家航母工程副总设计师。
description.en: Wu Xiaoguang served as the Deputy Chief Designer of the National Aircraft Carrier Project.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家航母工程副总设计师，吴晓光参与了辽宁舰的设计建造工作，对该舰的建成起到了推动作用。
description.en: As the Deputy Chief Designer of the National Aircraft Carrier Project, Wu Xiaoguang participated in the design and construction of the Liaoning aircraft carrier, playing a role in its completion.

description.zh-cn: 吴晓光于2004年3月接替朱英富担任中国舰船研究设计中心所长职务。
description.en: Wu Xiaoguang succeeded Zhu Yingfu as the director of the China Ship Research & Design Center in March 2004.

description.zh-cn: 卢晓晖于2018年9月后接替吴晓光担任中国舰船研究设计中心所长职务。
description.en: Lu Xiaohui succeeded Wu Xiaoguang as the director of the China Ship Research & Design Center after September 2018.

relationships.source: 中国船舶工业集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月，中国船舶工业集团有限公司与中国船舶重工集团有限公司合并，组建中国船舶集团。
description.en: In October 2019, China State Shipbuilding Industry Corporation merged with China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation to form China State Shipbuilding Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月，中国船舶重工集团有限公司与中国船舶工业集团有限公司合并，组建中国船舶集团。
description.en: In October 2019, China Shipbuilding Industry Corporation merged with China State Shipbuilding Industry Corporation to form China State Shipbuilding Corporation.
